body:
I am making a horror map and I need help.

Does anyone know player names of like bloody heads and that stuff?
body_tagged:
I am making a horror map and I need help.

Does anyone know player names of like bloody heads and that stuff?
title: Help Please

replies.body: Try search up some usernames like 'Halloween' or 'Skeleton' or something like that on McSkinSearch.com. You may find some there
replies.body_tagged: Try search up some usernames like 'Halloween' or 'Skeleton' or something like that on McSkinSearch.com. You may find some there

replies.body: Surely you could change your skin, insert your head then change it and repeat?
replies.body_tagged: Surely you could change your skin, insert your head then change it and repeat?

replies.body: I would rather not but that's a good suggestion. If it comes to it, I will do it.
replies.body_tagged: I would rather not but that's a good suggestion. If it comes to it, I will do it.

reply_to.body: Surely you could change your skin, insert your head then change it and repeat?
reply_to.body_tagged: Surely you could change your skin, insert your head then change it and repeat?

replies.body: BatMan already gave the most easiest suggestion and Aura gave you a good one as well, these are the only things that are available.
replies.body_tagged: BatMan already gave the most easiest suggestion and Aura gave you a good one as well, these are the only things that are available.

replies.body: I tried Batmans suggestion, and if it comes to needing to, I will do Auratixx's
